product_name: Columbia Silver Ridge III Shorts - Boys'
long_description: The rough-and-tumble boys' Columbia Silver Ridge III shorts offer sweat-wicking comfort, rugged durability and built-in sun protection to keep him cool during long days of outdoor play. Omni-Wick(TM) nylon fabric draws moisture away from skin to keep him dry and comfortable even when working up a sweat. Integrated Omni-Shade(TM) UPF 30 sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays so his skin stays safe no matter how long he stays outside. The Columbia Silver Ridge III shorts feature an interior adjustable waistband for personalized fit.
